title: Zed's a girl?? Confirmed by Riot Blaustoise!
body:
Just watch as LL Stylish doesn't correct Riot Blast(But instead watches twitch chat for a reaction, maybe he knows?) and how Blast doesn't refer to as 'he' but back to 'Zed'. Keep watching, because he makes this mistake over and over again.

Call me crazy, but I think this could be some evidence on Zed's gender.

Edit: I'm prob wrong xD

replies.body: this ain't it chief
Buff Yorick.
Yorick is in a perfect spot right now
yorick is actually pretty strong rn
strong ?? this board {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
leave him as a boy
If you ignore the overall masculine build, male voice, and how everyone and everything refers to him as male, sure.

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PNL8da2f,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-09T04:48:05.316+0000)
>
> If you ignore the overall masculine build, male voice, and how everyone and everything refers to him as male, sure.

Really? I thought he was trans.
Riot's official lore page for Zed says "He" you're reaching really hard with this one.
.....wtf? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
It literally states in **_HIS_** lore that he is male. "His story began as a **_Boy_** on the cold steps of home of the kinkou order" but then again it is 2018.

spoiler, he began as a boy , and ended as a DEAD

in this world you happen to live in, there is an arcane know as SURGERY

In the world our CHAMPIONS live. There is no thing such as surgery except hextech augmentations.
Not even our world-like aninals live withing Runeterra.
Jokes on you, another point proven wrong.

There is more than hextech augmentation :

List of champion partially augmented :
Camille (BTW she mention "surgeon"), Viktor, Urgot

List of champion REPAIRED :
sion, mundo (he is a "surgeon"),gangplanck,singed,ww (tho it's through medication) and last swain (well he used magic)

where on some case you can reference what they had as an augmentation.
and when you repair a limb with a prothesis, that's called surgery
i HIGHLY doubt surgery doesn't exist in runeterra

Still waiting for you to prove me wrong.

edit : https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/champion/singed/

singed story MENTIONS surgery you smart-ass :D

Sion was revived by noxian mages not used for some surfery.
Mundo wasn't operated at for "repairs" he regenerated his body himself.
These two have nothing to do with "surgeries", "smart-ass".

sion: i guess the metallic parts holding his limbs together is not metal, it's level 100 illusion magic ? it just popped up when they revived him ofc...

mundo : also, injecting products to modify body structure IS surgery (botox)

"One night, Mundo snuck into the kitchen. There, he found a massive meat cleaver. â€œMedicalâ€ blade in hand, Mundo proceeded to go from room to room, â€œoperatingâ€ on every â€œpatientâ€ he found with no logic to his method of â€œtreatmentâ€ other than what would amuse him the most at any given moment." -https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_PL/story/champion/drmundo/

mundo didn't inject anything into his body and didn't get anything injected. he just is that big purple boi who likes to murder people
his way of thinking that he is a doctor probably came from the fact that all he knew as a child was doctors who tried to find out what the fuck is wrong with him and torturing him to test his limits (spoiler: there's no limits to fun)
he just goes around and bringing people joy and happiness, because if he likes it, everyone else probably does too
If Zed is a female, but still has such masculine voice, she could be using shadow magic to change her voice, or the shadows we see aren't such, but smoke coming from the 72 cigars she smokes per day.
That bitch buff
Zed ult = Tiktok
Nahhh this is actually fucking hilarious

All these people assuming Zed's gender just because of masculine voice and Riot assuming gender by using "he".....lol.  kids playing LoL can't have strong female champs, their fragile minds will collapse.

       This game has a diverse selection of champion THAT ACTUALLY HAVE A BACKSTORY that adds DEPTH to there character and arent just written in by game developers to try and pander to SJWs that write game reviews who arenâ€™t really that good at most videos example- the footage of the reviewer from polygon getting stuck on the TUTORIAL LEVEL that tells you what to do the entire way and what buttons to push. 
       There is a saying that has come to speak true in the gaming community lately â€œGET WOKE GO BROKEâ€ and itâ€™s something EA has learn very recently with there stocks have been halved due to them going â€WOKEâ€ and now looking at Battlefield 5 they are going â€œBROKEâ€ because they care more about reviews than the people who buy their games.

      So please please PLEASE stop trying to SJW this game up because like a lot of us in the community WE DONT WANT TO SEE THIS GAME DIE.

Lol... I totally agree on how all the girls are great and theyâ€™re strong.... but being leftist is to support social equality... so he doesnâ€™t have leftist views. Essentially, ur saying he is supporting those who are being discriminated against so just watch your vocab. Also tbh this game kinda died since Zoe came out and started one shorting everyone (the last part was just a joke btw just referencing how all my friends complain about her) either way good day XD

No being a leftist is to protect a select people and overall screwing anyone outside of said protected people. For example most of you pick on white guys because of their â€œprivilegeâ€ ok so is it a privilege that we are 3 times more likely to commit suicide than women or is it a privilege that yall discriminate against us because of the color of our skin and for us being born men?

UHHHHH NO ITS NOT LOL
being leftist means ur supporting left wing political views, which, as i quote, "supports social equality and egalitarianism, often in opposition to social hierarchy. It typically involves a concern for those in society whom its adherents perceive as disadvantaged relative to others as well as a belief that there are unjustified inequalities that need to be reduced or abolished." Dude you need to get your head out of whatever self centered and idealistic world ur in saying that you're always right and that because some stuff happens to you and you find any comment that you happen to dislike you're going to use wrong information to try and prove it wrong and make me seem like the bad guy. Either way to answer your question and to rephrase shit... IM A GUY. also yeah its a privilege for people to commit suicide? does that comment make sense to you... dude use some logic lol

just saying that if you have been discriminated against for being non-white or male, so have I... and all in all this was just supposed to be a vocab checkup which you also got wrong... as communism, socialism, and modern â€œliberalismâ€ is considered the left wing of politicsâ€”and fascism, conservatism, and capitalism is considered the right. just like your hands... and sorry if it seems like im just a 12 year old just complaining but people trying to prove they're right using wrong definitions and shifting blame onto something else or changing the focus of an argument entirely is really messed up, has led to shit in my life, and overall kinda pushes my buttons
Akali and Irelia are literally broken.
In the lore it talks about him starting out as a boy....
Blaustoise has nothing to do with the lore, so even if he tried to change Zed it doesn't matter.
It is best not to listen to the balance team for lore as they focus on balance, not lore. If you want hints about lore, it is best to do so with the LORE team.
why is everyone downvoting it's just a j oke
Saying zed is a girl is not funny.... Keep all WOKE stuff out of my games I love for the love of almighty.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I feel ya dude! if League goes Woke, then they have to go broke.
Either this is a really good shitpost, or Zed is plausibly trans. But while plausible, I doubt the latter option. Good day, fellow League addict.

Nobody :
Stupid ass boy : zed is obviously a girl

Reasons for changing zed to a girl
1. Pc-more and more pc people are playing league. Also pushing for a more liberal agenda possibly to tap into the population not yet integrated
2. Attention-no doubt will cause some sort of controversy between fans. Leading to more exposure.
3. ðŸ”¥ hot- some people legit get turned on by this shit and this could be straight pandering to them.
4. Female gamers- with more girls playing games maybe riot is struggling to balance female and male characters. This one seems less likely tho.
5. Politics-will blend into the current political dominant media climate

But what is most important is to realize they are probably doing this for money. Otherwise why else change the gender of a champion.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Huh I can see how Zed could be a girl,I have seen so many animes where the girl character straps her boobs with bandegis and dressing like a boy and talk like one.      Maybe Zed was a girl from the beginning just she was raised like a boy.                        Zed's lore is a pretty old one and we don't get to much to see just the parts wear it got the shadow powers and the death of the master.

The website's original lore, and current lore, refers to him as male. He has a male build, male voice, literally nobody thinks he's a girl. We all agree that he's a male. 

Why the fuck would they randomly change that.

Can we throw the lore team out with the balance team now?
If this is true time to play Zed now. Hope they update his (wait...her) model to reflect it
"what doesn't kill you doesn't frustrate you" Sure but the old janna shield being constantly renewed on the adc making them immortal in team fights is totally not frustrating.
